meanings: (글·글씨 등을) write, (시·편지 등을) compose, (적다) put[write] (sth) down, (간단히) jot sth down

vlive.korean: 한 번 맞혀보세요 누구랑 누구랑 쓸 것 같아요? Take a guess. Who do you think are the roommates? 듣기 View video X1 : 시간 내에 제목이 떠오르지 않았습니다😂
vlive.english: Take a guess. Who do you think are the roommates?

vlive.korean: 못 쓸 것 같아요 - 왜 망가졌어요? I don't think it works. - Why? 듣기 View video Red Velvet : [FULL] 레드벨벳 컴백 라이브 - 짐살라빔 나잇
vlive.english: I don't think it works. - Why?

vlive.korean: [힌트 찬스를 쓸 것이냐 말 것이냐] 어떻게 생각해? 아닌가? [Whether to use a chance for clue or not] What do you think? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : [FULL] <찾았다 스트레이 키즈> 6화
vlive.english: [Whether to use a chance for clue or not] What do you think?

vlive.korean: 하면서 그걸 누가 쓸 것이냐. We wondered who would do that part. 듣기 View video V PICK! : [MONSTA X] 임꾸꿍 심야라디오 공구합니다📻 (I.M saying anything)
vlive.english: We wondered who would do that part.

vlive.korean: 그림들이 있어요. 팬콘을 위해 쓸 것들. Art that we're going to use for our fan concert. 듣기 View video THE BOYZ : Jking around 😎
vlive.english: Art that we're going to use for our fan concert.

examples.korean: The newly decorated office belongs to one of the executives. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 새로 단장한 사무실은 중역 중 한 사람이 쓸 것이다. Neungyule

examples.korean: Ministry officials urged businesses to be more conscious of saving energy. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 정부 관리들은 기업체들에게 에너지 절약에 대해 더 신경 쓸 것을 촉구하였다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
